name: L-Prototype
description: Objective the objective of this game is to run as far as possible so as not to be hit by landslides. So you must to run and dodge form the oncoming car Controls for web: Space = Jump                    ArrowDown = Down form the platform for android: tap left side screen = Jump                              doble tap right side screen = Down form the platform Credit sound form zapsplat.com taxi form <a href="<a href=" https:="" www.freepik.com="" vectors="" car"="">Car" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://www.freepik.com/vectors/car">Car</a> vector created by pch.vector - www.freepik.com bus form Business" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://www.freepik.com/vectors/business">Business vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com other car form Car" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://www.freepik.com/vectors/car">Car vector created by pch.vector - www.freepik.com tileset form itch.io by Joseth Fox form itch.io by ManozFlash
